title: Venice the magnificent
brief_description: A day in the life of Venice. Features the goldolas, canals, palaces and churches of Venice; art and architecture; history; daily life of the Venetians; Rialto Bridge on the Grand Canal; St Mark’s Piazza; the Grand Carnival.
